ygData.subject: Mask of Deception and Ultravision
ygData.msgSnippet: I posted earlier that I wasn t gaining ultravision when I activated the DE illusion from the Mask of Deception.  Someone followed up that the ultravision from
ygData.messageBody:
I posted earlier that I wasn't gaining ultravision when I activated the DE
illusion from the Mask of Deception. Someone followed up that the
ultravision from the Mask worked fine for them. Would like to hear from
other people who have a Mask of Deception to see if they get ultravision
when activating the illusion. Specifically need to know what race you are.
Its possible that the ultravision works for humans (who only have normal
vision) but may possibly be broken for wood elves and/or half-elves (who
have infravision). BTW my bard is a wood elf.

This request doesn't apply to people who have the Guise of the Deceiver.

Thanks
Galtin of E'ci
